a caminho de
on the way to

a coisa tá preta
things are looking bad

a essas horas
by this time

a fim de que
so that

à medida que
as long as

a meu ver
in my opinion

à moda antiga
in the old-fashioned way

a partir de (4 de março)
from (March 4th) on

a perder de vista
as far as eyes can see

à prova de bomba
bomb proof

à queima-roupa
at close range, point blank

a tempo
on time, in time

à vontade
at ease; to feel at home

aborrecer-se com
to become bored with

abra o olho
keep your eye on it

acabar de fazer algo
to have just done something

acertar o relógio
to set the clock, watch

achar graça
to think something is funny

acho que não
I don’t think so

acho que sim
I think so

afinal de contas
after all, the long run

aguentar a mão
just a minute, hold on

aliás
in fact, actually, in fact

amigo da onça
a false friend

anda, vamos
come on, let’s go

andar de branco
to wear white

andar de mal a pior
go from bad to worse

ao pé da letra
literally, by the book

ao pé de
near, close to

apertar o passo
to quicken your step

as aparências enganam
appearances are deceiving

às suas ordens
at your service

até logo
see you later, so long

atender a um pedido
to grant a request

atender ao telefone
to answer the telephone
